column4: ok so I get it to install kubuntu and it fails brings me to a black screen then it restarts
now my mouse is all laggy in windows
and firefox seems to reinstalled it self
wonder why kubuntu would just stop during the install...
also is it even possible that it messed with windows
mabye linux doesn't work on my system?
maybe you should ditch wubi and try installing the normal way?
mind you AFTER A FULL SCANDISK AND DEFRAG of windows
it takes about 2 weeks and comes with stickers
or you could go that route, and if you dont have a usb stick,  heh, use a camera
you have a digicam or ipod or psp?
its worth a try, if you can get your ipod bootable with the iso contents (not the iso itself, but you probably know that) on it you can run livecd from there
as long as you manually do the partition editing you *should* not run into problems (provided you know what youre doing)
again before you do anything...   SCANDISK DEFRAG SCANDISK
during the install process (unless you have a partition ready for ubuntu) you are going to be asked to make one
yes, but again you must choose wisely at the right screen >> see the manual partitoning https://help.ubuntu.com/8.04/installation-guide/i386/module-details.html#di-partition
